channel.title: CVE Feed for IDAttend Pty Ltd -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IDAttend Pty Ltd -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-1356|2023-10-26T06:25:25.905Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Reflected cross-site scripting in the StudentSearch component in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows hijacking of a user’s browsing session by attackers who have convinced the said user to click on a malicious link.

item.title: CVE-2023-26569|2023-10-26T06:44:28.213Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL injection in the StudentPopupDetails_Timetable method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction or modification of all data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26573|2023-10-26T06:47:05.701Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Missing authentication in the SetDB method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows denial of service or theft of database login credentials.

item.title: CVE-2023-26572|2023-10-26T06:46:43.081Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL injection in the GetExcursionList method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction or modification of all data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26568|2023-10-26T06:48:10.850Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL injection in the GetStudentGroupStudents method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction or modification of all data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26575|2023-10-26T06:47:51.174Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Missing authentication in the SearchStudentsStaff method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction sensitive student and teacher data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26579|2023-10-26T06:44:06.306Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Missing authentication in the DeleteStaff method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.013 allows deletion of staff information by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26580|2023-10-26T06:41:04.426Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated arbitrary file read in the IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.013 allows the retrieval of any file present on the web server by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26581|2023-10-26T06:41:38.351Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL injection in the GetVisitors method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction or modification of all data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26578|2023-10-26T06:43:42.336Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Arbitrary file upload to web root in the IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.013 allows authenticated attackers to upload dangerous files to web root such as ASP or ASPX, gaining command execution on the affected server.

item.title: CVE-2023-26574|2023-10-26T06:47:27.825Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Missing authentication in the SearchStudents method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction sensitive student data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.title: CVE-2023-26577|2023-10-26T06:43:25.745Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Stored cross-site scripting in the IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows attackers to hijack the browsing session of the logged in user.

item.title: CVE-2023-26582|2023-10-26T06:41:57.779Z -- idattend%20pty%20ltd -- idweb
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL injection in the GetExcursionDetails method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction or modification of all data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.description: Unauthenticated SQL injection in the GetCurrentPeriod method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction or modification of all data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.description: Missing authentication in the SearchStudentsRFID method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows extraction sensitive student data by unauthenticated attackers.

item.description: Missing authentication in the SetStudentNotes method in IDAttend’s IDWeb application 3.1.052 and earlier allows modification of student data by unauthenticated attackers.
